states.content:
The short answer - no (but they are good)

Running is quite a cheap sport to do, compared to most. Once you've invested in your shoes you're pretty much good to go. 


But, if you love gadgets, you can also find some in the running world which might peak your interest. 


Take a look at some of these running accessories and have a guess at what they do....
states.name: default

states.content:
Guess the function of the gadget!

Some are more obscure than others.

states.content: Wrong... the answer was a GPS running watch.
